thread.title_full: Sunny Cars Mietwagen bewertet von SIDDHANT BORA

author: SIDDHANT BORA
title: SIDDHANT BORA
text: How sunny car works is that they book a rent car for you to which they do offer you vollkasko insurance, but the car booked at the company mostly europcar gives a car on contract which has 500â‚¬ self payed insurance. If something happens you have to pay Europecars and then discuss and get that money from Sunnycar back. in normal sense when I just need a small car for the weekend It gives me better sense of insurance at no extra cost. I have no experience of going through insurance claim process with them- so far it is good
